name: Ballin' Seagulls
description:
Uh oh! You're trying to get back to the beach before sundown, but the horrible roads and sketchy drivers of Miami stand in your way! Can you beat the tourists to your home? Roll down the winding Seagullstate 7 as fast as possible, and you just might make it!

This game was made for the Game Dev Knight's 2022 Summer Jam.

WARNING: Lots of camera jitter may cause epilepsy
